mapper.insert: insert into member (memId, email, memName, memPwd, phone) values (#{memId}, #{email}, #{memName}, #{memPwd}, #{phone})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET email=#{email}, memName=#{memName}, memPwd=#{memPwd}, phone=#{phone} where memId=#{memId}
UPDATE member SET totalPay=#{totalPay} where memId=#{memId}
UPDATE member SET memPwd=#{memPwd} where email=#{email} and memId=#{memId}
mapper.select: select memId from member where email=#{email}
select memPwd from member where email=#{email} and memId=#{memId}
select * from member where memId=#{memId} and memPwd=#{memPwd}
select memId, email, memName, birthday, phone, membership from member order by #{memCate}
